Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>giant white stallion <clr:ffff>would be perfect
for that frame.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure of it.

But I don't think anyone's ever actually
seen that horse.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe it's not even real.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>The pair of travelers who told me about
it seemed so sure though.

They were going to take the road to
the <clr:0000>Lake of the Horse God southeast
of here<clr:ffff> and search for it there.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Wish I knew if that horse was real. I can't
exactly drop my work and leave the stable
to chase after a rumor.
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks to you, Link, the frame has the
picture it deserves. The stable has a
whole new feeling with it here.
The giant white stallion is a symbol of
hopeâ€”that there's always a chance any
day something great can happen.
Oh, such as...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>What if someone rode up to the stable
on the real giant white stallion one day?<sp:5:1:0>
Can you imagine?
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Have you looked at the sky to
the northeast?

There's an unnatural black cloud over
there. Lots of lightning.<sp:5:0:0> It gives me
the creeps.
It hasn't moved since the Upheaval. Not
even a strong wind can make it budge.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>What do you think is going on there?
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Are you serious? You're going to show
me <clr:0000>the giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?!
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Tired_01>Any image of it will do. If I can see what
the<clr:0000> giant white stallion looks<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>like <clr:ffff>up close,
I can paint a copy.
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>You can't take that with you, sir.<sp:5:1:0>
The association wants it displayed
at all times.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive><clr:ffff>Pretty, isn't it? The name comes from the
ring-shaped ruins in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

I hear you can find them in the village, so
why don't you go there if you want one?

Kakariko's northeast of the Skyview Tower
by the Dueling Peaks.
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You can buy one of these decorations
in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>. It's a little far, but
I'm sure you can manage.
Just go northeast from the Skyview Tower
near Dueling Peaks. You'll run into the
village soon enough.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But do you have a <clr:0000>picture of the
giant white stallion<clr:ffff>? That would be
something to behold!
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I'm sorry, but you can't take that. If you
want your own, you'll have to go all the
way to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>To get there, head northeast from the
Skyview Tower by the Dueling Peaks.
You'll see a village in the valley.
They sell these decorations there.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, what a sight for sore eyes!


With that <clr:0000>picture of a<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>
copied, I can proudly display it whenever
I want!
Or, if you'd rather I switch it for a
different one, just show me the
new picture!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It gets more enchanting the more you look
at it, doesn't it? Ah, such a fine horse...<sp:5:1:0>

If only I could ride the giant white stallion.
We would race across the wide plains...

<snd:LaughS>At my age, what's another dream to add
to the pile, eh?
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The giant white stallion... Does it truly
exist?<sp:5:0:0> Just how giant IS it?

Aah, if only I had a <clr:0000>picture of the
giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> It would be perfect
for that frame!
Com_Photo_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>A big frame like that is sure to be the
centerpiece of the stable, which means
I've got to put the perfect painting in it.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>So you know that rumor I told you about?<sp:5:0:0>
The one about the <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>I was thinking...a white horse is rare, but
a GIANT white horse? Incredible!<sp:5:1:0> And it
lives nearby, I hear.
A painting of that <clr:0000>giant stallion <clr:ffff>would go
perfect inside that frame.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure of it.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Tired_01>I just need to get a look at a <clr:0000>picture of
that giant white stallion<clr:ffff>, then I could
paint a copy and hang it on the wall.
9007: I want to leave it as is.
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Did you hear?<sp:5:0:0> There was a fire north of
the stable the other day. Just a small one,
thank goodness.
Apparently it was started by a young
flute player who was staying with us.
I heard he set off fireworks as a prank.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad>Hmph. Can you imagine? I haven't seen
him since. Maybe he ran away.
Com_Photo_01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That reminds me, I feel like I remember
seeing a <clr:0000>very large white horse<clr:ffff> among
the horses we're looking after for you...<sp:5:1:0>
<snd:LaughL_00>No...<sp:5:0:0>that's not possible, is it?<sp:5:1:0> Anyway,
I'd really like to see it, even just a picture
of it.
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>By the way, I heard a rumor from a pair
of travelers the other day about a
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
They hadn't actually laid eyes on this
white horse themselves yet.

But they were planning to take the road to
the <clr:0000>Lake of the Horse God southeast of
here<clr:ffff> and search for it there.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Now, I can hardly leave my work at the
stable, <sp:5:0:0>but I'd sure like to see that <clr:0000>giant
white stallion<clr:ffff> if it exists.
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Hold on...<sp:5:1:0> That horse there...<sp:5:1:0>is <clr:0000>white<clr:ffff>
and,<sp:5:0:0> uh,<sp:5:0:0> rather <clr:0000>large <clr:ffff>compared to the
other horses.
<snd:LaughS_01>Haha...<sp:5:1:0> but there's no way it could be
THE <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>...is...there?<sp:5:1:0>
HA! Ignore me. I'm just being foolish.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Folks are saying that they want to ride the
giant white stallion! <sp:5:0:0>Oho, it's such an
inspiring picture!
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice>Uh...<sp:5:1:0>your horse...


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>No, never mind...<sp:5:0:0> I must be mistaken.<sp:5:0:0>
Yeah, that must be it. Hahaha...

No one would just ride up here astride
THE <clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>. Nope. No way!<sp:5:0:0>
Unless...it was...a dream...
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> was there something you
wanted to do with the <clr:0000>painting of
the giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>To mark your first visit to
Highland Stable...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Not only is this your first visit to Highland
Stable, you've also <clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>!
So here...
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Have you looked at the sky to
the northeast?

There used to be an ominous black cloud
over there. Constant lightning. It was
enough to make me shiver.
It appeared after the Upheaval, but then
one day...poof!

It disappeared. All that's left is a new
floating island.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>What do you think happened there?
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>It's such an impressive frame, it's sure to
be the focus of the stable. But now I need
an impressive painting to go inside it.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I was thinking, I heard this rumor the
other day about this rare horse...this
<clr:0000>giant white stallion<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sounds impressive, doesn't it? I mean,
a white horse is pretty rare, but a giant
one? And it lives nearby, they say!
A <clr:0000>picture <clr:ffff>of an impressive creature
like a <clr:0000>giant white stallion <clr:ffff>would suit
that frame perfectly.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure of it!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Of course, the folks who told me about
this horse hadn't actually seen it with
their own eyes yet.
They were planning to take the road to
the <clr:0000>Lake of the Horse God southeast of
here<clr:ffff> and search for it there.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>If I knew for sure it was there, I would go
try to get a look at it.<sp:5:0:0> *sigh* But I can't
leave work for a rumor.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I wish I had some kind of <clr:0000>picture of that
giant white stallion<clr:ffff>. If I did, I'd use it for
reference and whip up a painting of it.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And, as a token appreciation for your first
time <clr:0000>lodging with us<clr:ffff> at Highland Stable...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait, you have a <clr:0000>picture of the
giant white stallion<clr:ffff>?
